channel.title: Need some Guidance
channel.description:
I know mopar is not the best website to ask for help but, some people can be very helpful.
I currently live with my mom in up-state new york. This summer my mom is moving to Florida, which is making me choose a decision. Do I go to my dads, or do I go to my mom in Florida. My dad lives in Pennsylvania, and if I went to Florida I would not see my dad very often, if ever until I leave Florida... But, if I went to my dad's he has work for 2 weeks and gets off for 2 weeks. So when hes at work for 2 weeks I would basically just be with my Aunt and Uncle but I would still see my dad. What do you guys think I should do?.. Go to my dads or stay with my mom and travel to Florida

item.title: Need some Guidance
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I’d say PA, only because it sounds better than Florida

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Guidance
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Thanks guys

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Guidance
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Listen to Acorn, Naples and Ft Myers are nice places, I live near there also.

And Tampa is not the best place if you did move to the northern places go to Clearwater imo.

inb4caseyontampa

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Guidance
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

I live in Florida and travel around to my mom’s and dad’s often (They live in different sections of Florida aswell N,S)
I say only move here if you’re coming to live down south near Naples/Miami/Ft Myers or the east coast if you’re going to live up North in places like Tampa don’t even bother.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Guidance
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:1, topic:440225”]I know mopar is not the best website to ask for help but, some people can be very helpful.

I currently live with my mom in up-state new york. This summer my mom is moving to Florida, which is making me choose a decision. Do I go to my dads, or do I go to my mom in Florida. My dad lives in Pennsylvania, and if I went to Florida I would not see my dad very often, if ever until I leave Florida… But, if I went to my dad’s he has work for 2 weeks and gets off for 2 weeks. So when hes at work for 2 weeks I would basically just be with my Aunt and Uncle but I would still see my dad. What do you guys think I should do?.. Go to my dads or stay with my mom and travel to Florida[/quote]

weigh your pros and cons up, either decision is going to suck so you may as well go for the better

read: if your mum is moving into a house with a heated swimming pool and a hot-tub, it may be better than spending 50/50 boxed up with your aunt and uncle

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Guidance
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:6, topic:440225”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=542903.msg3979311#msg3979311 date=1335050046]
Which one do you like more?
[/quote]

Equally[/quote]

go with your mom

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:6, topic:440225”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=542903.msg3979311#msg3979311 date=1335050046]
Which one do you like more?
[/quote]

Equally[/quote]
Not true, but you probably mean you don’t know which one you like/love more.

item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Sucks. No fear, your moparscape family will never break up!

item.title: Need some Guidance
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Florida is a really fun place to be if you have people with you. If you are going by yourself anywhere then that’s kinda weird but eh you’ll meet people I guess.

item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

m1lkman:

Which one do you like more?

This/your mum as constantly switching between your dads and aunts+ uncles houses can be annoying.

Florida is a nice place, allegedly.
